attributes.action: Cease offences under the Terrorism Act 2000 in Afghanistan
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We view the military action in Afghanistan as constituting "terrorism" as defined in the meaning of Section 1 of the Terrorism Act 2000.

The consequence of that is that the Prime Minister is committing criminal offences under Section 56 of the Terrorism Act 2000.

Put simply, please stop. Don't allow any more young men to die in uniorm as terrorists.

In addition, more than £10bn of public money has, we believe, been spent unlawfully.

Please stop that too.

reasons: Potentially libellous, false, or defamatory statements
